items.title: Walmart is selling a 'comfortable' $342 4-piece patio set for only $190
items.description: It comes with two cushioned chairs, a loveseat, and a wooden table.

items.title: Amazon is selling a travel backpack for $17 with a secret anti-theft feature
items.description: The bag has "lots of pockets" and is "comfy to wear."

items.title: Popular fast-food chain closes 20% of restaurants, no bankruptcy
items.description: The chain is selling its leases to what some might consider a controversial rival.

items.title: 30-year-old brewery and brewpub closing unexpectedly
items.description: Fans are beyond disappointed to hear that a regional favorite is shutting down.

items.title: Las Vegas Strip Sphere signs music superstar to residency
items.description: "I'm incredibly honored to be included in a handful of extraordinary musicians to play Sphere," Illenium told TheStreet.
